xmlquery.searchOrderItemByIdPOnPage: Select * from dongan_order_item where idPO=? order by idItem limit ?,2
xmlquery.orderItemDelete: Delete from dongan_order_item where idPO = ? and idItem=?
xmlquery.orderItemEdit: Update dongan_order_item set idPO=?,idItem=?,qty=?,description=?,unitPrice=?,extendedPrice=? where idPO=? and idItem=?
